results.description: Franck Ribery is banned for three matches and fined 20,000 euros for pushing an assistant referee following Fiorentina's 2-1 defeat by Lazio.
results.title: Franck Ribery gets three-match ban for pushing official after Fiorentina defeat

results.description: Fiorentina condemn AC Milan to a third consecutive Serie A defeat with a comfortable victory at the San Siro.
results.shortTitle: AC Milan lose third straight Serie A game
results.title: AC Milan 1-3 Fiorentina: Milan lose third Serie A game in a row

thumbnail.altText: Under-pressure AC Milan boss Marco Giampaolo

results.description: Former England teenage star Micah Richards reveals his experience of the dark side of football - when a wrecked knee made him a long-term absentee and he was abused by fans as he bid to save his career.
results.shortTitle: 'It's a lonely place - I felt like a ghost'
results.title: Micah Richards on the dark side of football - 'it's a lonely place, I felt like a ghost'

results.description: Juventus are held to a goalless draw by Fiorentina as manager Maurizio Sarri takes his place in the dugout for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Juventus held to draw by Fiorentina
results.title: Maurizio Sarri's Juventus held at Fiorentina in Serie A

results.description: Vivianne Miedema scores two and sets up a third as Arsenal outclass Fiorentina 4-0 in their Women's Champions League last-32 first-leg tie.
results.shortTitle: Miedema shines as Arsenal thrash Fiorentina
results.title: Women's Champions League: Arsenal outclass Fiorentina 4-0 in Italy in last-32 first leg

results.description: Liverpool forward Bobby Duncan joins Italian side Fiorentina on a permanent transfer.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool sell forward Duncan to Fiorentina
results.title: Bobby Duncan: Liverpool sell teenage forward to Fiorentina

results.description: France international Franck Ribery joins Serie A side Fiorentina on a free transfer after leaving Bayern Munich in the summer.
results.title: Franck Ribery: Fiorentina sign former Bayern Munich winger

results.description: Atalanta will play Lazio in the Coppa Italia final after beating Fiorentina in their semi-final second leg.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta into first final in 23 years
results.title: Atalanta 2-1 Fiorentina (5-4 agg): Bergamo side into first final in 23 years

results.description: Juventus win their eight straight Italian Serie A league title with a win over Fiorentina in front of home fans at the Allianz Stadium.
results.title: Juventus seal eighth straight Italian title with point against Fiorentina

thumbnail.altText: Cristiano Ronaldo (left) and Juventus manager Massimiliano Allegri

results.description: Fiorentina and Atalanta play out a six-goal thriller in the first leg of their Coppa Italia semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Fiorentina and Atalanta in cup thriller
results.title: Fiorentina 3-3 Atalanta: Coppa Italia semi-final first leg thriller

results.description: Jordan Veretout scores a 101st-minute penalty as Fiorentina draw with Inter Milan in late VAR controversy.
results.shortTitle: Fiorentina hold Inter after VAR drama
results.title: Fiorentina 3-3 Inter Milan: Jordan Veretout rescues point after VAR drama

results.description: Federico Chiesa scores a hat-trick as Fiorentina humiliated Roma 7-1 to reach the Coppa Italia semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Fiorentina thump Roma 7-1 in Coppa Italia
results.title: Fiorentina 7-1 Roma: Federico Chiesa scores a hat-trick as the Viola reach the Coppa Italia semi-finals

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores as unbeaten Juventus go 11 points clear at the top of the Serie A table by beating Fiorentina.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo scores as Juventus go 11 clear
results.title: Fiorentina 0-3 Juventus: Cristiano Ronaldo scores as champions win again

results.description: Chelsea cruise into the Women's Champions League quarter-finals as England's Fran Kirby scores a hat-trick at Fiorentina.
results.title: Women's Champions League: Fiorentina 0-6 Chelsea (0-7 agg)

results.description: Chelsea are to face Fiorentina of Italy in the Women's Champions League round of 16, while Glasgow City meet Barcelona.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea Women face Fiorentina in Europe
results.title: Women's Champions League: Chelsea face Fiorentina in round of 16

results.description: West Ham sign Spanish striker Lucas Perez and Colombia midfielder Carlos Sanchez.
results.shortTitle: Perez and Sanchez join West Ham
results.title: West Ham: Lucas Perez and Carlos Sanchez complete transfer deadline day moves

results.description: Everton winger Kevin Mirallas is to join Fiorentina on a season-long loan, subject to a medical.
results.shortTitle: Mirallas to make Fiorentina loan move
results.title: Everton's Kevin Mirallas to make Fiorentina loan move

results.description: Former Fiorentina captain Davide Astori's family thank fans for their support since his death aged 31 in March.
results.shortTitle: Astori family thank fans for support
results.title: Davide Astori: Former Fiorentina captain's family thank fans for support

results.description: Napoli's hopes of winning Serie A for the first time since 1990 suffer a setback as defeat at Fiorentina hands Juventus a clear advantage.
results.title: Fiorentina 3-0 Napoli

results.description: Fans of Fiorentina and Udinese held a minute's applause during the game which was rearranged after the death of Italy defender Davide Astori.
results.title: Udinese 0-2 Fiorentina
